name: S – a Ski-Synthesizer
description:
'S' is a relaxing Ski-Synthesizer that reacts to your movement. No winning, no loosing. Calm down,  loose yourself in the winter landscape and create Music.

Special Thanks to: Ivo Keller, Luca Imesch, Gaëtan Dilbert, JetSmith88 (Freesound.com), Lloyd Davies (Splash-Screen Logo) & all the Testers <3

 Supervising lecturers: Sonia Böckler. Rene Bauer

Zurich University of Arts, Gamedesign
